General.Name: MEDIANA Co.Ltd
General.Description: Mediana Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells medical devices in South Korea. It offers patient monitors, vital signs monitors, AEDs, monitors/defibrillators, fetal products, body composition analyzers, central monitoring systems, face masks, spot checks and monitors, pulse oximeters, and physio modules. The company also exports ODM and own branded products through agencies in approximately 80 countries. Mediana Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Wonju-si, South Korea.
